column2: X-Men: The End - Men and X-Men (2006) #1
column6:
The Endgame of the last tale of Marvel's most popular mutants begins! They've suffered through sneak attacks, betrayals, and fatalities-now, Professor X and Magneto are taking the fight back to the enemy, amidst the stars!,2006,1
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Sean Chen | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Sandu Florea | colorist:Ian Hannin | penciller (cover):Greg Land | letterer:Dave Sharpe
